title: Export summary agent and add server action
description:
Export the summary agent and add server action to generate completion summary.

Files to modify:
- src/mastra/agents/fo-05/index.ts - Add export for summary agent
- app/fo-05/actions.ts - Add generateCompletionSummary action

Implementation:

1. Update index.ts to export createFO05SummaryAgent from ./summary-agent

2. Add generateCompletionSummary server action in actions.ts that:
   - Creates the summary agent
   - Builds a prompt with the GatheringContext (name, familiarity, topics, exchanges)
   - Calls agent.generate() and returns the text
   - Returns empty string on error (graceful degradation)

3. Add buildSummaryPrompt helper function similar to buildDiscoveryPrompt
acceptance_criteria: npm run build passes; generateCompletionSummary is exported from app/fo-05/actions.ts
closed_reason: Added generateCompletionSummary action and buildSummaryPrompt helper
